website_summaries.verdict: About half the price of other sets with no compromise in style and quality. An incredible deal from Safavieh.
pros: Crystal base and white polyester shade create a crisp, fashionable look
Reliable Safavieh quality at a price that won't break your budget
cons: The 15-inch height is a bit too short for some tastes

customer_reviews.title: I love the sparkle
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs that come with these lamps are nice and bright. I use them for my vanity table and they work beautifully allowing me to see fine details for perfect makeup application. I also love the sparkle on the base of these lamps and that the shades aren't busy (there's a pleasant subtle sheen) so they don't compete with the base. Also these aren't full-sized lamps but they're not tiny so they're a perfect pair for a small desk or singly on side table.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Davies

customer_reviews.title: Cute color pop lamp
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a pop of color in my guest room. They look very pretty and I think they give off a a great amount of light when turned on. I like that the bulbs were included in the box. Everything was packaged very well and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: CLew

customer_reviews.title: The perfect lamp
customer_reviews.text: these two lamps are adorable, and the quality is great, they are perfect for what I purchased them for. Very satisfied customer. I would recommend these lamp to any one who wants a good quality lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these lamps. They are exactly what I was looking for and give off an amazing amount of light given that they are small night table lamps. They are just beautiful and the crystals in the base are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SerenitySeeker

customer_reviews.title: Lamp shades stained
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with how the lights were shipped/arrived. The lamp shades have this weird mold or rust on them. It’s too much for us to go get a new box and return, just thought I’d leave a review so no one else has to deal with this. See attached picture.
customer_reviews.author: Raelene Harster

customer_reviews.title: To o
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dining room. To offer another space for zoom events. The wattage is not so bright but they included LED bulbs that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Mowatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of lights, I love the crystal looks great quality and gives a touch to the bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Darling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and quality for my guest bedroom. Packaged perfectly as every lamp I’ve gotten from this company. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps!
customer_reviews.text: These look great, just like in the picture. Fantastic all around.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarrr freak!

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy Pay too much for something that's not worth it It arrived way too late and on top that the lamp shades are all bent up and the box was destroyed very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Fair warning these lamps are smaller than your average lamp BUT the size is exactly what i was looking for for my cubic shelves
customer_reviews.author: Shannycatt

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the crystal base
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than I anticipated but still works well as bedside lamps. Love the color and the crystal base.
customer_reviews.author: gary kleffner

customer_reviews.title: Small lamps
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY small. I sent them back. They are great for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the most beautiful table lamps I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the most beautiful table lamps I've owned. The base looks like crystal and the shades are a deep burnt orange. Definitely a statement maker.
customer_reviews.author: Lonica L Bush

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as picture
customer_reviews.text: Could be a bit bigger but other than that everything else is fine
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are beautifully made and great for the price, if you see these I def suggest you purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis H Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are just perfect on my night stands. I love them
customer_reviews.author: PETER DelV

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size and color. Great quality. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: These lamps, which are made in China, are pretty sharp looking. Particularly with the lamp turned on, the orange lampshade isn't as flashy as you might expect; I was worried that the shades might look a little obnoxious, but I don't believe that it does. Everything was packaged carefully in a surprisingly small box. The box contains two CFL (corkscrew-type) bulbs, so the lamps are ready to go right out of the box. It's as simple as screwing in the light bulb and plugging it in. Can't get any easier.
customer_reviews.author: Md Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! Been looking for a good set for my daughters room, that was affordable and beautiful.. and this set does not disappoint!!! Shipping was faster than expected, the items were carefully packaged AND they even included two light bulbs; which is awesome since that's super rare to find!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olia Polivoda

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered multiple sets of lamps from amazon for my new apartment and these are the only ones that lasted. Look great and put off great light.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: classy
customer_reviews.text: A bit too small for the living room so had to put them in the bedroom. cute but more for a little girls room.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are well made and the crystal is clear and well shaped. It is an asset to any bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: ... two day delivery however when I receive it I love it. Goes great in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This was not an two day delivery however when I receive it I love it. Goes great in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The picture doesn't lie.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried buying it online that it would look cheap, but I love them. Adds a color pop to our bedroom nightstands in an otherwise muted color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These lamps make me feel like I'm somebody lol. Very elegant. Nice size for my dresser. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing! Bought them for kids room in orange color ...
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing ! Bought them for kids room in orange color and they look great, thanks

customer_reviews.title: I like them they're very cool
customer_reviews.text: I have this connected to a set of Philips Hue Lights awesome.
customer_reviews.author: GCODE

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought the crystal base with orange shades which gives off a lovely glow. The color and texture of each shade is perfect. Two light bulbs came with the order and the lamps were easy to set up. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JetSetter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamps - Good Price
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are well made and were packaged properly. No scratches or dents. They're solid lamps and the shades aren't the cheap ones you'd normally expect. I also appreciate they came with bulbs! The shade color is burnt-orange.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

product_meta.title: Safavieh Lighting Collection Crescendo Clear and White Tiered Crystal 15-inch Table Lamp (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: Color:Clear/WhiteInspired by art deco geometric forms, the glistening base of the crescendo tiered crystal table lamp sets the stage for glamour in any room. Crafted of faceted clear crystal, this timeless design will refract light beautifully and bathe a living room or bedroom with a soft, warm glow. The crescendo lamp is paired with a white Geneva shade in a transitional empire shape.
feature_bullets: This lamp is crafted of crystal
Perfect for a living room, bedroom, den, library, study or office
For over 100 years, Safavieh has been crafting products of the highest quality and unmatched style
To clean, wipe with a soft, dry cloth; Avoid the use of chemicals and household cleaners as they may damage the finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
